Home.title: Nelson & Odwa
Home.paragraph: Together with our families, cordially invite you to share in the joy at our wedding celebration

Story.text: Our love story had its humble beginnings in July 2018 when fate brought us together on a bursary trip in Johannesburg. Little did we know that this chance encounter would set the stage for our wonderful journey through life together.
Story.name: Where It All Began

Story.text: As time passed, we found ourselves reunited, this time at a graduate program. What started as a casual acquaintance soon blossomed into a deep and cherished friendship. We laughed together, supported each other through thick and thin, and shared countless unforgettable moments.
Story.name: Friendship Blossoms

Story.text: In early 2020, we took a leap of faith that would change our lives forever. Recognizing the deep connection we shared, we decided to embark on this beautiful journey of life together. It was a decision filled with hope, love, and excitement for the future.
Story.name: The Leap of faith

Story.text: In November 2021, our love story took a delightful turn when we opened our hearts and home to a furry friend. We adopted a dog named Vinnie, who quickly became an integral part of our lives. His wagging tail, boundless energy, and unconditional love brought even more joy into our journey.
Story.name: Welcoming Vinnie into Our Lives

Story.text: Fast forward to September 2022, a day etched in our hearts forever. He got down on one knee, and with trembling anticipation, he asked the question that would forever change our lives: "Will you marry me?" Without hesitation, she said those magical words, "YES!" Tears of joy and a promise of forever sealed our love.
Story.name: A Proposal to Remember

Story.text: And now, as we eagerly look ahead to February 2024, we are thrilled to announce that we are officially tying the knot. Surrounded by our closest friends and beloved family members, we can't wait to begin this new chapter in our lives as husband and wife.
Story.name: Tying the Knot

GettingThere.text: For those of you travelling from Cape Town, you have 2 main options

GettingThere.name: Option 1: Road Trip!!
GettingThere.text: Driving from Cape Town to Rustenburg, it is about a 15 hour drive. It is recommended that you split the drive over 2 days with a sleepover stop in Kimberley. This is a 10 hour drive. From Kimberley, you will be 5 hours away from Rustenburg.

GettingThere.name: Option 2: The savvy timesaver
GettingThere.text: You could fly directly from Cape Town Internation Airport to Lanseria International airport in Pretoria and hire a car for your time in Rustenburg. The fastest route from Lanseria airport to Rustenburg is 1hr 22min. Flying to OR Tambo international airport is also an option but adds about 30-40 min to your journey.
